title: Radio Tirana: harmony and forschung
creator_credit: Michael Langoth, Helmut Stadlmann and Trizeps Video
brief_description: A collaboration between avant-garde video makers and musicians which utilises computer animation, video collage, and media cut-ups to present some cutting edge music compositions. An Austrian production, this video is an excellent introduction to the experimental sounds of European electronic and industrial music.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Langoth, Helmut Stadlmann and Trizeps Video
